name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_135I
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "I" means the element "iodine" and "135I" is the isotope "iodine-135" with a half-life of 2.79e-01 days.
